comment._content: Another Bain Collection photo of Federal League officials: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/6288471843/]

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Weeghman's name is spelled correctly on the negative, but is misspelled several times in the LOC notes. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Weeghman en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Federal_League See also: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_A._Gilmore

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: artlog:  Thanks for pointing out our spelling error.  We'll correct the mistakes next time we update.
